Israelis wear dog tags in solidarity with hostages and each otherOn Israeli city streets and on television, in shops and in cafes, one symbol of solidarity with hostages held in Gaza has become ubiquitous in the 100 days since Hamas abducted them: military-style dog tags worn on neckchains. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 10:10:30 GMT YA7O73RHFROOZKWRNGO52NMRDU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-wear-dog-tags-solidarity-with-hostages-each-other-2024-01-14/Estelle Shirbon世界中东地区
Four migrants die trying to cross the ChannelFour migrants trying to cross the Channel to Britain died in French waters in the early hours of Sunday, a spokesperson for the local prefecture told Reuters. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 09:21:23 GMT 7ZO5L6GSENN5PENKBYYEAJM7WM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/four-migrants-trying-to-die-cross-channel-2024-01-14/Reuters世界欧洲
Russian poet Lev Rubinstein dies at 76 -daughterLev Rubinstein, a Russian poet known for his conceptual art work subverting traditional Soviet era forms, died on Sunday, his daughter Maria said on Sunday. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 08:49:16 GMT O2BU2MIKSVJPZIJNLA36ZCUTMQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-poet-lev-rubinstein-die-76-daughter-2024-01-14/Reuters世界欧洲
Volcano erupts in Iceland, posing risk to fishing townA volcano erupted in southwest Iceland on Sunday, posing an immediate threat to a nearby fishing town that had been evacuated over fears of an outbreak, authorities said. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 08:17:15 GMT HUH6DJC52NL5LKT4IUBFI3NHLM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/volcano-erupts-southwest-iceland-2024-01-14/Reuters世界欧洲
China's diplomats condemn foreign governments over Taiwan post-election remarksChina's foreign ministry and embassies around the world this weekend warned countries against supporting Taiwan's Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) and condemned foreign governments that congratulated the island's president-elect Lai Ching-te. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 07:56:59 GMT VFDBZ6AZOZLQFFBOOKJKLRQ66HQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinese-embassies-condemn-foreign-officials-over-taiwan-post-election-remarks-2024-01-14/Eduardo Baptista世界亚太地区
Ex-mayor of Russia city goes to fight in Ukraine after bribery conviction - KommersantA former mayor of the Russian city of Vladivostok has enlisted to fight in Ukraine and departed for the front after he was sentenced to 12 years in prison for corruption, the Kommersant newspaper reported on Sunday, citing his lawyer. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 07:55:33 GMT HDMBYDA6ONONREO6GFP42ATFLM https://www.reuters.com/world/ex-mayor-of- Russian-city-goes-fight-ukraine-after-bribery-conviction-businessman-2024-01-14/Reuters世界
Former US officials to visit Taiwan for post-election talksTwo former senior U.S. officials will arrive in Taiwan on Sunday for post-election talks and underscore the U.S. government's "longstanding interest" in peace across the Taiwan Strait, the de facto U.S. embassy in Taipei said. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 07:17:29 GMT 2ELEANZDEFN7XMB7YYSXTDHVM4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/former-us-officials-visit-taiwan-post-election-talks-2024-01-14/Reuters世界亚太地区
North Korea's foreign minister to visit Russia - KCNANorth Korea's Foreign Minister Choe Son Hui will visit Russia from January 15 to 17, North Korea's state KCNA news agency said on Sunday. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 07:16:25 GMT PNQJO5WORDFONTNAMEXDWMRMF2QI https://www.reuters.com/world/north-korean-foreign-minister-visits-Russian-kcna-2024-01-14/Reuters世界
Israel's military says it killed nine militants in GazaIsraeli forces have killed at least nine Palestinian militants during operations in the Gaza Strip, the military said on Sunday. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 07:15:52 GMT B53GHFPTRJNBDKCCFLYT6PK5GU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-military-says-it-killed-nine-militants-in-gaza-2024-01-14/Reuters世界中东地区
Indonesia's Marapi volcano erupts again, a month after deadly incidentIndonesia's Marapi volcano erupted on Sunday, with ash rising 1,300 metres (4,300 feet) from the peak six weeks month after a fatal eruption, according to the country's geological agency. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 07:08:56 GMT KGNY7NUAE5KWVEKZVOJ3BRGZIA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesia-marapi-volcano-erupts-again-month-after-deadly-incident-2024-01-14/Reuters世界亚太地区
Taiwan's new president faces 'tough' time with China pressure, no parliament majorityTaiwan's president-elect Lai Ching-te could face a tough four years in office with no parliamentary majority, an opposition which wanted to re-start a vexed service trade deal with China and the ever present threat of military action from Beijing. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 06:20:44 GMT 4A5R4DRA35MQDDNS4FYVJJUTNM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-new-president-faces-tough-time-with-china-Pressure-no-parliament-2024-01-14/Yimou Lee, Sarah Wu, James Pomfret世界亚太地区
